subject: Productivity
title: Scenario Planning
description: A quick, practical guide to Scenario Planning.

hook.text: Shell Oil predicted the 1973 oil crisis before it happened. Not through prediction, but through scenario planning.

buildup.text: Scenario planning creates multiple plausible futures instead of betting on one forecast. It's strategy for uncertainty.

discovery.text: Teams develop three to four scenarios, then stress-test their strategy against each. Robust plans survive all of them.

twist.text: The value isn't in predicting the right future. It's in preparing minds to respond quickly when any future arrives.

climax.text: Shell outperformed every major oil company for decades using scenario planning. Preparation beat prediction.

punchline.text: You can't predict the future. You can prepare for several.

quiz.question: What is the main value of scenario planning?
options: Preparing minds to respond to multiple possible futures
